description.description: A description you can use to identify the Card Profile.

digital_wallets.description: How Cards should appear in digital wallets such as Apple Pay. Different wallets will use these values to render card artwork appropriately for their app.

app_icon_file_id.description: The identifier of the File containing the card's icon image.

background_image_file_id.description: The identifier of the File containing the card's front image.

card_description.description: A user-facing description for the card itself.

contact_email.description: An email address the user can contact to receive support for their card.

contact_phone.description: A phone number the user can contact to receive support for their card.

contact_website.description: A website the user can visit to view and receive support for their card.

issuer_name.description: A user-facing description for whoever is issuing the card.

text_color.description: The Card's text color, specified as an RGB triple. The default is white.

blue.description: The value of the blue channel in the RGB color.

green.description: The value of the green channel in the RGB color.

red.description: The value of the red channel in the RGB color.

$block: This contains artwork and metadata relating to a Card's appearance in digital wallet apps like Apple Pay and Google Pay. For more information, see our guide on [digital card artwork](https://increase.com/documentation/card-art)

$ul: **created_at**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time at which the Card Dispute was created.
**description**: A description you can use to identify the Card Profile.
**digital_wallets**: How Cards should appear in digital wallets such as Apple Pay. Different wallets will use these values to render card artwork appropriately for their app.
**app_icon_file_id**: The identifier of the File containing the card's icon image.
**background_image_file_id**: The identifier of the File containing the card's front image.
**card_description**: A user-facing description for the card itself.
**contact_email**: An email address the user can contact to receive support for their card.
**contact_phone**: A phone number the user can contact to receive support for their card.
**contact_website**: A website the user can visit to view and receive support for their card.
**issuer_name**: A user-facing description for whoever is issuing the card.
**text_color**: The Card's text color, specified as an RGB triple.
**blue**: The value of the blue channel in the RGB color.
**green**: The value of the green channel in the RGB color.
**red**: The value of the red channel in the RGB color.
**status**: The status of the Card Profile.
**type**: A constant representing the object's type. For this resource it will always be `card_profile`.
